fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Refine a player, changing their role into another role that the host views as an equivilant to their current role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a role can't be upgraded, they instead gain an increase to their attack and and a decrease to their defense tier (or vice versa), gaining an attack ability if they didn't already, should they gain attack. You are not notified of this.
- If you self target, you become Fine (3789) or Coarse (3790). This is random.
